#| output: asis
#| echo: false

color = report.final_color()
badge = report.badge(color)

# Title — hyperlink to repo if available
if report.model_repo_url:
    title = f"[{report.model_name}]({report.model_repo_url})"
else:
    title = report.model_name

# Subtitle with version
if report.model_version:
    title += f" v{report.model_version}"

print(f"## {title} — {badge} {{.unlisted}}")
print()

# Info line
parts = [f"**Report Date:** {report.report_date}", f"**Model ID:** `{report.model_id}`"]
if report.primary_model_developer:
    parts.append(f"**Developer:** {report.primary_model_developer}")
print(" &nbsp;|&nbsp; ".join(parts))
print()
print("---")
